name: Abundance
text: If you would draw a card, you may instead choose land or nonland and reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

rulings.text: This replacement effect replaces the draw, so nothing that triggers on a draw will trigger.

If you use this on a multi-card draw, each replaced draw is handled separately. In other words, you reveal and then put on the bottom of the library for the first card, then do the same for the second, and so on. In a multi-card draw you do not have to choose how many of those draws will be replaced before you do any drawing or use of this card.
If no card of the chosen type is found before your library empties, you don’t get a card, but you do get to order all the cards in your library any way you choose.

If your library is empty, Abundance can prevent you from losing the game for being unable to draw a card. If an effect or turn-based action would cause you to draw a card, you can replace that draw with Abundance’s replacement effect. (It doesn’t matter that you’d be unable to actually draw a card.) Since Abundance’s effect has you put a card into your hand instead of drawing a card, you’ll never be forced to draw a card with an empty library.

foreignNames.flavor: 祖神が改めて生き物の数を決めたとき、鷲は人間になりたいと希望した。 祖神はその祈りを半分だけかなえてやった。 ――遊牧の民の神話

foreignNames.name: Caça-Nuvens Aviano
foreignNames.text:
Voar (Esta criatura só pode ser bloqueada por criaturas com a habilidade de voar ou alcance.)
Quando Caça-Nuvens Aviano entrar em jogo, destrua o encantamento alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: "Na nova Repartição, as Águias imploraram para ser humanas. A Ancestral concedeu metade daquela súplica." — Mito dos nômades

foreignNames.name: Загонщик Облаков
foreignNames.text:
Полет (Это существо может быть заблокировано только существом с Полетом или Захватом.)
Когда Загонщик Облаков входит в игру, уничтожьте целевые чары.
foreignNames.flavor: "На Великом распределении Орел умолял о том, чтобы стать человеком. Но Прародитель пожаловал лишь половину испрошенного". — Миф кочевников

foreignNames.name: 艾文逐云战士
foreignNames.text:
飞行（只有具飞行或延势异能的生物才能阻挡它。）
当艾文逐云战士进场时，消灭目标结界。
foreignNames.flavor: 「在分判日时，老鹰乞求成为人类。 圣祖灵仅允诺了半份祈愿。」 ～游牧人神话

originalText:
Flying
When Aven Cloudchaser comes into play, destroy target enchantment.

text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Aven Cloudchaser enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment.
flavor: "At the Reapportionment, Eagle begged to be human. The Ancestor granted half that prayer." —Nomad myth

name: Aven Fisher
text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Aven Fisher dies, you may draw a card.
flavor: The same spears that catch their food today will defend their homes tomorrow.

foreignNames.name: Avior-Fischer
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend (Diese Kreatur kann außer von fliegenden Kreaturen und Kreaturen mit Reichweite nicht geblockt werden.)
Wenn der Avior-Fischer aus dem Spiel auf einen Friedhof gelegt wird, kannst du eine Karte ziehen.
foreignNames.flavor: Mit denselben Speeren, mit denen sie heute ihr Essen aufspießen, werden sie morgen ihre Häuser verteidigen.

foreignNames.name: Pescador aven
foreignNames.text:
Vuela. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada excepto por criaturas que tengan la habilidad de volar o alcance.)
Cuando el Pescador aven vaya a un cementerio desde el juego, puedes robar una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Las mismas lanzas que usan los aven para atrapar su comida hoy, defenderán sus hogares mañana.

foreignNames.name: Pêcheur avemain
foreignNames.text:
Vol (Cette créature ne peut être bloquée que par des créatures avec le vol ou la portée.)
Quand le Pêcheur avemain est mis dans un cimetière depuis le jeu, vous pouvez piocher une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: Ils défendront demain leur maison avec cette même lance qui leur sert aujourd'hui à attraper leur nourriture.

foreignNames.name: Pescatore Aviano
foreignNames.text:
Volare (Questa creatura non può essere bloccata tranne che da creature con volare o raggiungere.)
Quando il Pescatore Aviano viene messo in un cimitero dal gioco, puoi pescare una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Le stesse lance che catturano oggi il loro cibo difenderanno un domani le loro case.

foreignNames.name: エイヴンの魚捕り
foreignNames.text:
飛行 （このクリーチャーは飛行や到達を持たないクリーチャーによってブロックされない。）
エイヴンの魚捕りが場からいずれかの墓地に置かれたとき、あなたはカードを１枚引いてもよい。
foreignNames.flavor: エイヴンが食べ物を捕るために使う槍は、いつでも身を守る武器になるだろう。

foreignNames.name: Pescador Aviano
foreignNames.text:
Voar (Esta criatura só pode ser bloqueada por criaturas com a habilidade de voar ou alcance.)
Quando Pescador Aviano é colocado num cemitério vindo de jogo, você pode comprar um card.
foreignNames.flavor: As mesmas lanças que caçam sua comida hoje irão defender suas casas amanhã.

foreignNames.name: Воздушный Рыболов
foreignNames.text:
Полет (Это существо может быть заблокировано только существом с Полетом или Захватом.)
Когда Воздушный Рыболов попадает из игры на кладбище, вы можете взять карту.
foreignNames.flavor: Те же копья, что сегодня добывают им пищу, завтра будут защищать их дома.

foreignNames.name: 艾文渔人
foreignNames.text:
飞行（只有具飞行或延势异能的生物才能阻挡它。）
当艾文渔人从场上置入坟墓场时，你可以抓一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 手握同支长矛，猎捕今朝食物，保卫明日家园。

Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Aven Fisher dies, you may draw a card.
flavor: The same spears that catch their food today will defend their homes tomorrow.

name: Aven Windreader
text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{1}{U}: Target player reveals the top card of their library.
flavor: "The tiniest ripple tells a story ten fathoms deep."

foreignNames.name: Avior-Lüfteleser
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend (Diese Kreatur kann außer von fliegenden Kreaturen und Kreaturen mit Reichweite nicht geblockt werden.)
{1}{U}: Ein Spieler deiner Wahl zeigt die oberste Karte seiner Bibliothek offen vor.
foreignNames.flavor: „Selbst die kleinste Welle erzählt eine lange Geschichte."

foreignNames.name: Leevientos aven
foreignNames.text:
Vuela. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada excepto por criaturas que tengan la habilidad de volar o alcance.)
{1}{U}: El jugador objetivo muestra la primera carta de su biblioteca.
foreignNames.flavor: "La ola más pequeña cuenta una historia de una profundidad de 10 brazas."

foreignNames.name: Avemain déchiffre-vent
foreignNames.text:
Vol (Cette créature ne peut être bloquée que par des créatures avec le vol ou la portée.)
{1}{U} : Le joueur ciblé révèle la carte du dessus de sa bibliothèque.
foreignNames.flavor: « La plus petite des vaguelettes conte des histoires profondes de dix brasses. »

foreignNames.name: Scrutavento Aviano
foreignNames.text:
Volare (Questa creatura non può essere bloccata tranne che da creature con volare o raggiungere.)
{1}{U}: Un giocatore bersaglio rivela la prima carta del suo grimorio.
foreignNames.flavor: "La più piccola increspatura racconta una storia che si è svolta a dieci leghe di profondità."

foreignNames.name: エイヴンの風読み
foreignNames.text:
飛行 （このクリーチャーは飛行や到達を持たないクリーチャーによってブロックされない。）
{1}{U}：プレイヤー１人を対象とし、そのプレイヤーのライブラリーの一番上のカードを公開する。
foreignNames.flavor: 水面のほんの小さな波紋が、深い水底で起こっていることを伝えてくれる。

foreignNames.name: Leitor dos Ventos Aviano
foreignNames.text:
Voar (Esta criatura só pode ser bloqueada por criaturas com a habilidade de voar ou alcance.)
{1}{U}: O jogador alvo revela o card do topo de seu próprio grimório.
foreignNames.flavor: "A menor ondulação na superfície conta uma história com dez braças de profundidade."

foreignNames.name: Предсказатель Ветров
foreignNames.text:
Полет (Это существо может быть заблокировано только существом с Полетом или Захватом.)
{1}{U}: Целевой игрок показывает верхнюю карту своей библиотеки.
foreignNames.flavor: "Даже по самой легкой ряби можно догадаться о том, что творится на глубине".

foreignNames.name: 艾文风信师
foreignNames.text:
飞行（只有具飞行或延势异能的生物才能阻挡它。）
{1}{U}：目标牌手展示其牌库顶牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「甚至连最微小的水纹都透露出十噚深的故事。」

name: Aven Windreader
text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{1}{U}: Target player reveals the top card of their library.
flavor: "The tiniest ripple tells a story ten fathoms deep."

name: Ballista Squad
text: {X}{W}, {T}: Ballista Squad deals X damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor: The perfect antidote for a tightly packed formation.

foreignNames.name: Ballistaeinheit
foreignNames.text: {X}{W}, {T}: Die Ballistaeinheit fügt einer angreifenden oder blockenden Kreatur deiner Wahl X Schadenspunkte zu.
foreignNames.flavor: Das perfekte Gegenmittel zu einer dichten Formation.

foreignNames.name: Escuadra de ballesta
foreignNames.text: {X}{W}, {T}: La Escuadra de ballesta hace X puntos de daño a la criatura atacante o bloqueadora objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: Es el antídoto perfecto para una formación apretada.

foreignNames.name: Escouade de balistes
foreignNames.text: {X}{W}, {T} : L'Escouade de balistes inflige X blessures à la créature attaquante ou bloqueuse ciblée.
foreignNames.flavor: L'antidote parfait à la formation serrée.

foreignNames.name: Unità Balista
foreignNames.text: {X}{W}, {T}: L'Unità Balista infligge X danni a una creatura attaccante o bloccante bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: L'antidoto perfetto per una formazione estremamente compatta.

foreignNames.name: バリスタ班
foreignNames.text: {X}{W}, {T}：攻撃かブロックしているクリーチャー１体を対象とする。バリスタ班はそれにＸ点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: 密集した隊形のための完璧な対策だ。

foreignNames.name: Esquadrão de Balista
foreignNames.text: {X}{W}, {T}: Esquadrão de Balista causa X pontos de dano à criatura alvo atacante ou bloqueadora.
foreignNames.flavor: O antídoto perfeito contra as formações muito cerradas.

foreignNames.name: Баллиста
foreignNames.text: {X}{W}, {T}: Баллиста наносит X повреждений целевому атакующему или блокирующему существу.
foreignNames.flavor: Прекрасное средство против сплоченных отрядов.

foreignNames.name: 巨弩小队
foreignNames.text: {X}{W}，{T}：巨弩小队对目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物造成X点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 对付坚实紧密的阵型之良方。

originalText: {X}{W}, {T}: Ballista Squad deals X damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

name: Bandage
text:
Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor: Life is measured in inches. To a healer, every one of those inches is precious.

rulings.text: You draw the card when Bandage resolves, not when the damage is actually prevented.

foreignNames.name: Verband
foreignNames.text:
Verhindere den nächsten 1 Schadenspunkt, der in diesem Zug einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl zugefügt würde.
Ziehe eine Karte.
foreignNames.flavor: Das Leben wird in Spannen gemessen. Für einen Heiler ist jede dieser Spannen wertvoll.

foreignNames.name: Vendaje
foreignNames.text:
Prevén el siguiente 1 punto de daño que se le fuera a hacer a la criatura o jugador objetivo este turno.
Roba una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: La vida se mide en centímetros. Para un sanador, cada uno de esos centímetros es precioso.

foreignNames.name: Bandage
foreignNames.text:
Prévenez, ce tour-ci, la prochaine 1 blessure qui devrait être infligée à une cible, créature ou joueur.
Piochez une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: La vie se mesure en centimètres. Pour le guérisseur, chacun d'eux est précieux.

foreignNames.name: Fasciatura
foreignNames.text:
Previeni il prossimo punto danno che verrebbe inflitto a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio in questo turno.
Pesca una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: La vita è una questione di centimetri. Per un guaritore, ogni centimetro è prezioso.

foreignNames.name: 目かくし
foreignNames.text:
クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。このターン、次にそれに与えられるダメージを１点軽減する。
カードを１枚引く。
foreignNames.flavor: 命にとっては、一寸先は闇だ。 癒し手にとっては、その一寸が貴重なのだ。

foreignNames.name: Atadura
foreignNames.text:
Previna o próximo 1 ponto de dano que seria causado à criatura ou ao jogador alvo neste turno.
Compre um card.
foreignNames.flavor: A vida é medida em centímetros. Para um curandeiro, cada um desses centímetros é precioso.

foreignNames.name: Повязка
foreignNames.text:
Предотвратите следующее 1 повреждение, которое будет нанесено целевому существу или игроку в этом ходу.
Возьмите карту.
foreignNames.flavor: Жизнь измеряется пядями. Настоящий целитель дорожит каждой из них.

foreignNames.name: 包扎
foreignNames.text:
于本回合中，防止接下来将对目标生物或牌手造成的1点伤害。
抓一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 生命由许多小部分组成。 对医者而言，这每个小部分都珍贵无比。

originalText:
Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
Draw a card.

name: Battlefield Forge
text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}. Battlefield Forge deals 1 damage to you.

rulings.text: The damage dealt to you is part of the second mana ability. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.
Like most lands, each land in this cycle is colorless. The damage dealt to you is dealt by a colorless source.

foreignNames.name: Feldschmiede
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {1}.
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {R} oder {W}. Die Feldschmiede fügt dir 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

foreignNames.name: Forja del campo de batalla
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Agrega {1} a tu reserva de maná.
{T}: Agrega {R} o {W} a tu reserva de maná. La Forja del campo de batalla te hace 1 punto de daño.

foreignNames.name: Forge de campagne
foreignNames.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {1} à votre réserve.
{T} : Ajoutez {R} ou {W} à votre réserve. La Forge de campagne vous inflige 1 blessure.

foreignNames.name: Forgia da Campo
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {1} alla tua riserva di mana.
{T}: Aggiungi {R} o {W} alla tua riserva di mana. La Forgia da Campo ti infligge 1 danno.

foreignNames.name: 戦場の鍛冶場
foreignNames.text:
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{1}を加える。
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{R}か{W}を加える。 戦場の鍛冶場はあなたに１点のダメージを与える。

foreignNames.name: Forjaria do Campo de Batalha
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Adicione {1} à sua reserva de mana.
{T}: Adicione {R} ou {W} à sua reserva de mana. Forjaria do Campo de Batalha causa 1 ponto de dano a você.

foreignNames.name: Кузница на Поле Боя
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Добавьте {1} в ваше хранилище маны.
{T}: Добавьте {R} или {W} в ваше хранилище маны. Кузница на Поле Боя наносит вам 1 повреждение.

foreignNames.name: 战场融炉
foreignNames.text:
{T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。
{T}：加{R}或{W}到你的法术力池中。 战场融炉对你造成1点伤害。

originalText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool. Battlefield Forge deals 1 damage to you.

name: Beacon of Destruction
text: Beacon of Destruction deals 5 damage to any target. Shuffle Beacon of Destruction into its owner's library.
flavor: The Great Furnace's blessing is a spectacular sight, but the best view comes at a high cost.

rulings.text: If a Beacon is countered or doesn’t resolve, it’s put into its owner’s graveyard, not shuffled into the library.

foreignNames.name: Leitstern der Zerstörung
foreignNames.text: Der Leitstern der Zerstörung fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl 5 Schadenspunkte zu. Mische den Leitstern der Zerstörung in die Bibliothek seines Besitzers.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Segnung der Großen Schmelze ist spektakulär anzusehen, aber den besten Blick muss man meist teuer bezahlen.

foreignNames.name: Faro de destrucción
foreignNames.text: El Faro de destrucción hace 5 puntos de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo. Baraja el Faro de destrucción en la biblioteca de su propietario.
foreignNames.flavor: La bendición del Gran horno es un gran espectáculo, pero las mejores ubicaciones tienen un alto precio.

foreignNames.name: Flambeau de la Destruction
foreignNames.text: Le Flambeau de la Destruction inflige 5 blessures à une cible, créature ou joueur. Mélangez le Flambeau de la Destruction dans la bibliothèque de son propriétaire.
foreignNames.flavor: La bénédiction du Grand Fourneau est un spectacle qui malheureusement coûte cher à ceux qui veulent y assister.

foreignNames.name: Faro della Distruzione
foreignNames.text: Il Faro della Distruzione infligge 5 danni a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio. Rimescola il Faro della Distruzione nel grimorio del suo proprietario.
foreignNames.flavor: La benedizione della Grande Fornace è una visione spettacolare, ma i posti migliori per guardarla hanno un prezzo molto salato.

foreignNames.name: 破壊の標
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。破壊の標はそれに５点のダメージを与える。 破壊の標をオーナーのライブラリーに加えて切り直す。
foreignNames.flavor: 大焼炉の祝福は素晴らしい見ものだが、一番見栄えの良い場所は高くつく。

foreignNames.name: Guia da Destruição
foreignNames.text: Guia da Destruição causa 5 pontos de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo. Embaralhe Guia da Destruição no grimório de seu dono.
foreignNames.flavor: A bênção da Grande Fornalha é algo espetacular de se ver, mas a melhor vista tem um preço alto.

foreignNames.name: Маяк Разрушения
foreignNames.text: Маяк Разрушения наносит 5 повреждений целевому существу или игроку. Втасуйте Маяк Разрушения в библиотеку его владельца.
foreignNames.flavor: Благословление Великого горнила это по-настоящему впечатляющее зрелище, где за лучшие места платят дорогую цену.

foreignNames.name: 毁灭信标
foreignNames.text: 毁灭信标对目标生物或牌手造成5点伤害。 将毁灭信标洗入其拥有者的牌库。
foreignNames.flavor: 熔炉天恩之景象壮丽至极，但最好的景点可能让你付出极高代价。

originalText: Beacon of Destruction deals 5 damage to target creature or player. Shuffle Beacon of Destruction into its owner's library.

name: Beacon of Immortality
text: Double target player's life total. Shuffle Beacon of Immortality into its owner's library.
flavor: The cave floods with light. A thousand rays shine forth and meld into one.

rulings.text: If you double a negative life total, you do the real math. A life total of -10 becomes -20.
Beacon of Immortality’s effect counts as life gain (or life loss, if the life total was negative) for effects that trigger on or replace life gain (or life loss).
If a Beacon is countered or doesn’t resolve, it’s put into its owner’s graveyard, not shuffled into the library.

foreignNames.name: Leitstern der Unsterblichkeit
foreignNames.text: Verdopple die Lebenspunkte eines Spielers deiner Wahl. Mische den Leitstern der Unsterblichkeit in die Bibliothek seines Besitzers.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Höhle füllt sich mit Licht. Tausend Strahlen leuchten hinein und verschmelzen miteinander.

foreignNames.name: Faro de inmortalidad
foreignNames.text: Duplica el total de vidas del jugador objetivo. Baraja el Faro de inmortalidad en la biblioteca de su propietario.
foreignNames.flavor: La cueva está inundada de luz. Miles de rayos brillan de ella y se funden en uno.

foreignNames.name: Flambeau de l'Immortalité
foreignNames.text: Doublez le total de points de vie du joueur ciblé. Mélangez le Flambeau de l'Immortalité dans la bibliothèque de son propriétaire.
foreignNames.flavor: La caverne est baignée de lumière. Mille rayons convergent pour n'en plus former qu'un.

foreignNames.name: Faro dell'Immortalità
foreignNames.text: Raddoppia i punti vita di un giocatore bersaglio. Rimescola il Faro dell'Immortalità nel grimorio del suo proprietario.
foreignNames.flavor: La caverna è inondata di luce. Migliaia di raggi balenano nel buio e si fondono in un unico sprazzo.

foreignNames.name: 不死の標
foreignNames.text: プレイヤー１人を対象とし、そのプレイヤーのライフの総量を２倍にする。 不死の標をオーナーのライブラリーに加えて切り直す。
foreignNames.flavor: 洞穴は光に満ちている。 幾千もの光が注ぎだし、そして一つにと溶け合うのだ。

foreignNames.name: Guia da Imortalidade
foreignNames.text: Duplique o total de pontos de vida do jogador alvo. Embaralhe Guia da Imortalidade no grimório de seu dono.
foreignNames.flavor: A caverna se inunda de luz. Milhares de raios reluzem e se combinam em um.

foreignNames.name: Маяк Бессмертия
foreignNames.text: Удвойте количество жизни целевого игрока. Втасуйте Маяк Бессмертия в библиотеку его владельца.
foreignNames.flavor: Свет наполняет пещеру. Тысяча лучей, вспыхивая, сливается в один.

foreignNames.name: 永生信标
foreignNames.text: 将目标牌手的总生命加倍。 将永生信标洗入其拥有者的牌库。
foreignNames.flavor: 洞窟内光华满溢；万道白芒激射而出，终尔融聚为一。

originalText: Double target player's life total. Shuffle Beacon of Immortality into its owner's library.

name: Beacon of Unrest
text: Put target artifact or creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Shuffle Beacon of Unrest into its owner's library.
flavor: A vertical scream pierces the night air and echoes doom through the clouds.

rulings.text: If a Beacon is countered or doesn’t resolve, it’s put into its owner’s graveyard, not shuffled into the library.

foreignNames.name: Leitstern der Unruhe

foreignNames.text: Quando il Demone di Fuoco di Bogardan viene messo in un cimitero dal gioco, infligge 2 danni a una creatura bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: "Il prossimo che viene a dirmi di rannicchiarmi accanto al fuoco e rilassarmi è un uomo morto." —Mirri della Cavalcavento

foreignNames.name: ボガーダンの炎魔
foreignNames.text: ボガーダンの炎魔が場からいずれかの墓地に置かれたとき、クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ボガーダンの炎魔はそれに２点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: 今度、暖炉のそばで丸くなって休んでいればなんて言うやつがいたら、あの世行きだからね。 ――ウェザーライト号のミリー

foreignNames.name: Flamidemo de Bogardan
foreignNames.text: Quando Flamidemo de Bogardan é colocado no cemitério vindo do jogo, ele causa 2 pontos de dano à criatura alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: "O próximo que me mandar relaxar e me aconchegar junto ao fogo pode se considerar morto." — Mirri dos Bons Ventos

foreignNames.name: Богарданский Огневик
foreignNames.text: Когда Богарданский Огневик попадает из игры на кладбище, он наносит 2 повреждения целевому существу.
foreignNames.flavor: "Следующий, кто скажет мне "расслабься и посиди у огня", может считать себя мертвым". — Мирри с Везерлайта

foreignNames.name: 博卡登炎魔
foreignNames.text: 当博卡登炎魔从场上置入坟墓场时，它对目标生物造成2点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 「要是哪个家伙再叫我躺在火边休息，他就死定了。」 ～晴空号的米丽

originalText: When Bogardan Firefiend is put into a graveyard from play, it deals 2 damage to target creature.

name: Boomerang
text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor: Early Jamuraan hunters devised a weapon that would return to its source. Tolarian Aethermancers developed a spell that skipped the weapon entirely.

foreignNames.name: Bumerang
foreignNames.text: Bringe eine bleibende Karte deiner Wahl auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: Vor langer Zeit entwickelten Jäger in Jamuraa eine Waffe, die zu ihrem Ursprung zurückkehren würde. Tolarianische Äthermagier entwickelten einen Zauberspruch, der ganz ohne die Waffe auskam.

foreignNames.name: Búmerang
foreignNames.text: Regresa el permanente objetivo a la mano de su propietario.
foreignNames.flavor: Los cazadores primitivos de Jamuraa desarrollaron un arma que podía volver a su fuente. Los étermantes de Tolaria desarrollaron un hechizo que ignoraba por completo el arma.

foreignNames.name: Boomerang
foreignNames.text: Renvoyez le permanent ciblé dans la main de son propriétaire.
foreignNames.flavor: Les premiers chasseurs jamuréens conçurent une arme qui reviendrait à sa source. Les Aethermanciens tolarians développèrent un sort pour se passer de l'arme.

foreignNames.name: Boomerang
foreignNames.text: Fai tornare un permanente bersaglio in mano al suo proprietario.
foreignNames.flavor: Gli antichi cacciatori di Jamuraa inventarono un'arma che ritornava al punto di partenza. Gli Etermanti di Tolaria svilupparono una magia che evitava del tutto l'arma.

foreignNames.name: ブーメラン
foreignNames.text: パーマネント１つを対象とし、それをオーナーの手札に戻す。
foreignNames.flavor: かつてのジャムーラの狩人は、手元に戻ってくる武器を作り出した。 トレイリアの霊気術士は、そもそも武器すら不要な呪文を生み出した。

foreignNames.name: Bumerangue
foreignNames.text: Devolva a permanente alvo para a mão de seu dono.
foreignNames.flavor: Os antigos caçadores de Jamuraa criaram uma arma que retornaria ao ponto de partida. Os etermantes tolarianos desenvolveram uma mágica que omitia totalmente a arma.

foreignNames.name: Бумеранг
foreignNames.text: Верните целевой перманент в руку его владельца.
foreignNames.flavor: Древние джамуранские охотники придумали оружие, которое возращалось к своему источнику. Толарианские эфироманты создали заклинание, полностью выполняющее роль такого оружия.

foreignNames.name: 回力镖
foreignNames.text: 将目标永久物移回其拥有者手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 早年的杰姆拉猎人发明了能回到手上的武器。 陶拉里亚乙太术士则跳过武器阶段，直接发展出这类咒语。

foreignNames.name: Бутылочные Гномы

foreignNames.flavor: 增援...或是点心？

foreignNames.flavor: Sie hält die oberen Bereiche des Waldes frei von jeder Bedrohung... außer ihr selbst.

foreignNames.name: Aranha Baldaquina

foreignNames.name: 林冠蜘蛛

name: Cephalid Constable
text: Whenever Cephalid Constable deals combat damage to a player, return up to that many target permanents that player controls to their owner's hand.
flavor: Cephalids don't police people. They police loyalties.

foreignNames.name: Zephaliden-Konstabler
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn der Zephaliden-Konstabler einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügt, bringe bis zu dieser Anzahl bleibende Karten deiner Wahl, die dieser Spieler kontrolliert, auf die Hand ihrer Besitzer zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: Zephaliden überwachen nicht Einzelpersonen, sie überwachen Loyalitäten.

foreignNames.name: Agente cefálido
foreignNames.text: Siempre que el Agente cefálido haga daño de combate a un jugador, regresa hasta esa misma cantidad de permanentes objetivo que controla ese jugador a las manos de sus propietarios.
foreignNames.flavor: Los cefálidos no vigilan personas. Vigilan lealtades.

foreignNames.name: Constable céphalide
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois que le Constable céphalide inflige des blessures de combat à un joueur, renvoyez dans les mains de leurs propriétaires jusqu'à ce nombre de permanents ciblés que ce joueur contrôle.
foreignNames.flavor: Les céphalides ne régentent pas le peuple. Ils régentent les loyautés.

foreignNames.name: Connestabile Cefalide
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta il Connestabile Cefalide infligge danno da combattimento a un giocatore, fai tornare fino ad altrettanti permanenti bersaglio controllati da quel giocatore in mano ai loro proprietari.
foreignNames.flavor: I cefalidi non proteggono le persone. Proteggono la fedeltà.

foreignNames.name: セファリッドの警官
foreignNames.text: セファリッドの警官がいずれかのプレイヤーに戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、そのプレイヤーがコントロールするパーマネントを、最大その点数に等しい個数まで対象とし、それらをオーナーの手札に戻す。
foreignNames.flavor: セファリッドは人々の治安を取り締まっているのではない。 忠誠を取り締まっているのだ。

foreignNames.name: Policial Cefálida
foreignNames.text: Toda vez que Policial Cefálida causar dano de combate a um jogador, devolva aquela quantidade de permanentes alvo que aquele jogador controla para as mãos dos seus donos.
foreignNames.flavor: Os cefálidas não policiam as pessoas. Eles policiam lealdades.

foreignNames.name: Цефалид-Дружинник
foreignNames.text: Каждый раз, когда Цефалид-Дружинник наносит боевые повреждения игроку, верните до такого же количества целевых перманентов под контролем того игрока в руки их владельцев.
foreignNames.flavor: Цефалиды охраняют не людей. Они охраняют их преданность.

foreignNames.name: 章人保安官
foreignNames.text: 每当章人保安官对某牌手造成战斗伤害时，将至多此数量由该牌手操控的目标永久物移回其拥有者手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 章人不管理人的治安。 他们要管的是忠诚问题。

originalText: Whenever Cephalid Constable deals combat damage to a player, return up to that many target permanents that player controls to their owners' hands.

name: Chimeric Staff
text: {X}: Chimeric Staff becomes an X/X Construct artifact creature until end of turn.
flavor: The staff unraveled in a chaotic chorus of clanging, becoming an improbable beast of hissing blades.

rulings.text: A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

If Chimeric Staff is already an artifact creature when you activate its ability, Chimeric Staff stays an artifact creature but the ability resets its creature types. You always apply the effect from this card before counters or other effects that modify power and toughness. For example, if you pay {3} to make it a 3/3, then someone gives it -1/-1, it will be a 2/2. If you then activate the ability with {4}, you will apply the “4/4” effect before the -1/-1 effect, so the end result will be a 3/3. Damage that was dealt to the creature stays on it.

foreignNames.name: Chimärenstab
foreignNames.text: {X}: Der Chimärenstab wird bis zum Ende des Zuges zu einer X/X Konstrukt-Artefaktkreatur.
foreignNames.flavor: Der Stab entfaltete sich unter einem chaotischen Klirren und Scheppern und wurde zu einer unberechenbaren Bestie aus zischenden Klingen.

foreignNames.flavor: Le bâton se déploya dans un grand fracas métallique pour devenir une bête improbable de lames sifflantes.

foreignNames.name: 盖美拉之杖

name: Cho-Manno, Revolutionary
text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Cho-Manno, Revolutionary.
flavor: "Mercadia's masks can no longer hide the truth. Our day has come at last."

foreignNames.name: Cho-Manno
foreignNames.text: Verhindere allen Schaden, der Cho-Manno zugefügt würde.
foreignNames.flavor: „Merkadias Masken können die Wahrheit nicht länger verbergen. Unsere Stunde ist endlich gekommen."

foreignNames.text: Prevén todo el daño que fuera a ser hecho a Cho-Manno, revolucionario.
foreignNames.flavor: "Las máscaras de Mercadia no pueden seguir ocultando la verdad. Al fin ha llegado nuestro día."

foreignNames.name: Cho-Manno, révolutionnaire
foreignNames.text: Prévenez toutes les blessures qui devraient être infligées à Cho-Manno, révolutionnaire.
foreignNames.flavor: « Les masques de Mercadia sont tombés. Notre jour est enfin arrivé. »

foreignNames.name: Cho-Manno, Rivoluzionario

foreignNames.flavor: "Le maschere di Mercadia non possono più nascondere la verità. Il nostro giorno è infine arrivato."

foreignNames.name: 革命家チョー＝マノ

foreignNames.name: Cho-Manno, Revolucionário
foreignNames.text: Previna todo o dano que seria causado a Cho-Manno, Revolucionário.
foreignNames.flavor: "As máscaras de Mercádia não podem mais esconder a verdade. Nosso dia finalmente chegou."

foreignNames.name: Чо-Манно, Революционер

foreignNames.flavor: "Маски Меркадии больше не могут скрывать правду. Наконец наш день пришел".

foreignNames.name: 革命家柯·曼诺
foreignNames.text: 防止将对革命家柯·曼诺造成的所有伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 「玛凯迪亚之假面将再也掩藏不住事实。 我们的时代终于来临了。」

name: Chromatic Star

name: Clone
text: You may have Clone enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

rulings.text: If the chosen creature is copying something else (for example, if the chosen creature is another Clone), then your Clone enters the battlefield as whatever the chosen creature copied.
If the chosen creature is a token, Clone copies the original characteristics of that token as stated by the effect that put it onto the battlefield. Clone is not a token.

Any enters-the-battlefield abilities of the copied creature will trigger when Clone enters the battlefield. Any “as [this creature] enters the battlefield” or “[this creature] enters the battlefield with” abilities of the chosen creature will also work.
If the chosen creature has {X} in its mana cost (such as Protean Hydra), X is considered to be zero.

Clone copies exactly what was printed on the original creature and nothing more (unless that creature is copying something else or is a token; see below). It doesn’t copy whether that creature is tapped or untapped, whether it has any counters on it or Auras attached to it, or any non-copy effects that have changed its power, toughness, types, color, or so on.
If Clone somehow enters the battlefield at the same time as another creature, Clone can’t become a copy of that creature. You may choose only a creature that’s already on the battlefield.
You can choose not to copy anything. In that case, Clone enters the battlefield as a 0/0 Shapeshifter creature, and is probably put into the graveyard immediately.
Clone’s ability doesn’t target the chosen creature.

name: Coat of Arms
text: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it. (For example, if two Goblin Warriors and a Goblin Shaman are on the battlefield, each gets +2/+2.)

rulings.text: If a creature has more than one creature type, and one of those types matches the creature you are calculating for, then count that creature. Only one type needs to match in order to get counted.
If you have a creature with more than one creature type, count all creatures which have either creature type.
Sharing multiple creature types doesn’t give an additional bonus. Coat of Arms counts creatures, not creature types.
